title: O My, Omicron Has Landed | Guests: Matt Ridley & Scott Thompson | 11/29/21
description:
Glenn and Stu discuss the new “Omicron” variant of COVID and the fearmongering coverage by the media. Author Matt Ridley joins to discuss the Omicron variant and his new book, "Viral." YouTube is hiding Glenn's COVID special, and Amazon is selling summary books of Glenn’s newest book before it’s even been released. Scott Thomson, vice mayor of Oroville, California, joins Glenn to discuss how he labeled his town a “Constitutional Republic,” independent from California’s mandates. Notre Dame is being rebuilt to be a “woke theme park.” Glenn warns of a one-world government being formed. Glenn and Stu discuss the media manipulation on the reporting of the Waukesha Christmas parade atrocity.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
